name: setOBEXSessionOpenConnectionCallback(_:refCon:)
desc: For C API support. Allows you to set the callback to be invoked when the OBEX connection is actually opened.
declaration:
func setOBEXSessionOpenConnectionCallback(_ inCallback: IOBluetoothOBEXSessionOpenConnectionCallback!, 
                                   refCon inUserRefCon: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
